column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Pretty good Ramen. Unfortunately my standards soared after Totton Ramen in New York which is everything a Ramen place should be like. In any case
column3: good noodles and good toppings. My only complaint is that the place is too "fancy". To me
column4: slurping a bowl of Ramen should happen in a no-frills humble abode and this place has really cold AC and techno music (which always decreases the quality of my culinary experiences).
